thread.title: NASA Delays James Webb Space Telescope By About a Year

author: Andy Pasztor
title: NASA Delays James Webb Space Telescope By About a Year
text:
NASA on Tuesday announced a roughly one-year launch delay for the James Webb Space Telescope, blaming some of the setbacks plaguing its premier space-science program on “avoidable errors” by prime contractor Northrop Grumman Corp.
The multibillion-dollar project, beset by busted schedules and major cost overruns stretching back to the start of the decade, now is slated to blast off around May 2020 rather than the previously announced June 2019. During a media briefing Tuesday, top agency officials attributed part of problem...
